title: Under Old Nell's Skirt - images in last sentence

content.question: Which of the following best describes the images in the last sentence of the passage (Paragraph 2)?

choices.label: A random listing of repulsive or frightening occurrences
A thorough review of absurd legends
A series of increasingly detailed and implausible events
A chronological account of major storms

content.answer: A series of increasingly detailed and implausible events

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
